name: Ron's Turtle Cake
author: R.P.
instructions: Prepare cake mix as directed on box. Pour 1?2 of the batter into a greased and floured 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake at 350Â° for 15 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool. Combine caramels, milk, and butter. Melt ingredients and pour over the cake. Then sprinkle chips and pecans over caramel mixture. Pour remaining batter over caramel mixture and sprinkle with 1?2 cup of pecans. Return cake to oven and bake for 15 minutes.
